title: Invention of the Printing Press
description: Johannes Gutenberg invents the printing press, revolutionizing the spread of knowledge.

title: Discovery of America
description: Christopher Columbus reaches the Americas in 1492, marking the beginning of global exploration.

title: French Revolution
description: The French Revolution begins in 1789, reshaping France and influencing democracies worldwide.

title: Industrial Revolution
description: Major industrial advancements transform societies from agrarian to industrial economies.

title: American Civil War
description: A conflict between the North and South over slavery and states' rights.

title: First Flight
description: The Wright brothers achieve the first powered flight in 1903 in Kitty Hawk, North Carolina.

title: World War I
description: A global war centered in Europe lasting from 1914 to 1918.

title: Moon Landing
description: Neil Armstrong becomes the first human to set foot on the Moon in 1969.

title: Fall of the Berlin Wall
description: The Berlin Wall falls in 1989, symbolizing the end of the Cold War.

title: Rise of the Internet
description: The internet becomes a transformative force in global communication and information exchange.
